Her husband Subhas has been engaged in a business of making and selling flattened rice (also called beaten rice). It is called “chira” in the Bengali language. It is a very popular snack that is often taken at breakfast. It is descended rice, which is flattened into flat, light, dry flakes. These flakes of rice swell when added to liquid, whether hot or cold, as they absorb water, milk, or any other liquids. He purchases rice from the rice dealers and makes it in his home with the help of his spouse and oldest son. Hemanta and her husband work hard all day long to make this, and her son helps to deliver it to different shops in the market. In order to cope with the growing needs of her family, she wants to enlarge the business.

So Hemanta has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to purchase more ingredients like rice for her husband's business. She hopes it will help her husband to fulfill the local demand and earn more profit through the business.

She wants to expand her business in order to strengthen the family economy and have a secure future for her family. She dreams to admit her son into a renowned college for better education.

She will always be grateful to BJS and Kiva for this financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more paddy rice for her husband's flattened rice business.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es: Salvador, tiene 29 años de edad, está soltero, vive junto a su padre en el municipio de La Campa, Lempira. Siempre se a dedicado a la producción de granos básicos, hace 7 años cultiva su propia parcela de café. La producción la vende en grano oro a intermediarios o al mercado local. El préstamo que ha solicitado es de 20,000 lempiras para la compra de fertilizantes y aplicar a su finca de café. Esta inversión le ayudara a obtener una mejor cosecha. Su plan es seguir con la siembra de café para aumentar la producción y ganancias.
texts.en:
Salvador is 29 years old, single, and lives together with his father in the town of La Campa, Lempira.  He has always worked farming basic staples.  

For the past 7 years he has cultivated his own coffee plot.  He sells his yield as parchment coffee to intermediaries or in the local market.  The loan that he is requesting is for 20,000 lempiras to buy fertilizers and apply them to his coffee farm.  This investment will help him to get a better harvest.  His plan is to continue sowing coffee in order to increase his yield and earnings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to use on his coffee farm.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
El  señor  Luis  es una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive  con sus 2 hijos y nietos  en el  sur de Honduras. Su negocio es  la  venta   de cerdos  desde hace más de 8 años. 
Don Luis necesita el préstamo para la compra  de cerdos. Con el préstamo espera que las ventas en su negocio aumenten al tener más producto que ofrecer y atender  mejor  a sus clientes,  espera con la inversión que realice a su negocio poder cubrir las necesidades  que tiene y mejorar un poco su calidad  de vida y la de su familia.
Don Luis en unos años espera que su negocio siga  creciendo  y se convierta en uno negocio reconocido de la zona y que sus hijos  se conviertan en personas de bien y con mejores oportunidades en la  sociedad.


Choluteca, Honduras  –  Agosto   del   2014
texts.en:
Luis is a responsible, hardworking, and honest person.  He lives with his two children and grandchildren in southern Honduras.  His business for more than eight years has been selling pigs.

Luis needs this loan to purchase pigs.  With the loan, he hopes that his sales will increase upon having more options to offer and in this way to offer better customer service.  With this investment, he hopes his business can cover his needs and improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

In the next few years, Luis hopes that his business will keep growing and turn into a well-known business in the area.  He also hopes that his children will become people of means, with better opportunities in society.

Choluteca, Honduras - August 2014

loans.use: to buy pigs for his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise such as groceries and sodas to stock his store.

loans.name: Reina Margarita

texts.es: Reina de 38 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 18, 15 y 8 años de edad. Ella es una mujer tenaz que se gana la vida con la elaboración de prendas de vestir las cuales elabora en su vivienda desde hace 20 años, además buscando mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia elabora y distribuye una gran diversidad de pan dulce, dicha actividad la realiza en los cantones cercanos  a su comunidad desde hace 6 años. Reina desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda, ya que este es antiguo por lo que se encuentra bastante deteriorado, pero al no contar con el financiamiento necesario solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Reina, age 38, lives in her own home together with her husband and three children, ages 8, 15, and 18.  She is a tenacious woman who has earned her living making clothes from her home for the past 20 years.  Looking to improve her family’s quality of life, she also makes and distributes a great variety of pastries.  She has done that in the nearby neighborhoods for the past six years.  

Reina wants to change the roof of her home because it is old and pretty deteriorated, but she doesn’t have the necessary funds.  She is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails in order to change the roof on her home.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails in order to change the roof on her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bolts of fabric, thread, and other accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a wide variety of fruits, vegetables, and fish in order to stock up, sell a greater quantity, and improve his quality of life.

loans.name: Rosa Adelaida

texts.es: Rosa de 32 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijas de 8 y 4 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida vendiendo variedad de ropa de forma ambulante en los cantones cercanos, además su esposo le aporta al hogar económicamente gracias a su trabajo como vendedor por mayoreo. Rosa es una mujer sencilla que desea mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, para lo que desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para sus hijas, es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro para construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda.
texts.en: Rosa, 32, lives in her own home with her husband and their 2 daughters, aged 8 and 4.  She is an enterprising woman who earns a living selling a variety of clothing.  She sells from place to place in the nearby cantons.  Her husband also helps to support the household financially, thanks to his work as a wholesaler.  Rosa is an unassuming woman who wants to improve her family's living conditions.  To do this, she wants to build a bedroom for her daughters.  This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and steel to add a bedroom to her house.

loans.use: to buy building materials to add a bedroom to her house

loans.name: Enia

texts.en: At the age of 24, Enia is an inspiring entrepreneur in her community. She is married with one child and resides in the Hurungwe District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully buying and selling clothes for over 10 months. She sells jackets, shirts, skirts and dresses. When she is not working in her flea market, Enia serves as a Camfed Learner Guide at the local secondary school teaching students life skills. With this Kiva loan, Enia will make bulk purchases of jackets, shirts, skirts and dresses to reduce costs and boost her sales volumes and profits. Her hope is to grow the business and open her own store. This will bring stability to her business and will enable her to secure her further education as well as provide for her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase jackets, shirts, skirts and dresses in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jennys Karolina

texts.es:
Dirigir y trabajar en el entorno económico-financiero siempre fue de interés para Jennys, razón por la que estudió la carrera de Administración de Empresas. Su amor por las finanzas la llevo a graduarse como una de las alumnas más destacadas de la clase. Tiene 29 años, está casada y tiene dos hijos, de 10 y 15 años, ambos asisten a clases, ya que para ella es primordial que se desarrollen académicamente. Es una mujer inteligente y emprendedora, tiene dos empleos, en la semana trabaja como cajera y los sábados y domingo es maestra en una universidad de su ciudad. 
Jennys solicita el crédito para seguir creciendo como profesional, requiere pagar un curso de especialización en Gerencia de Calidad. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios y es una meta persona que desea cumplir y no dejarla pendiente. Agradece el apoyo de su esposo y sus padres, quienes día a día la motivan a cumplir sus sueños, espera nunca defraudarlos y seguir adelante. Entres sus planes futuros está lograr estabilidad económica y comprar una casa propia.
texts.en:
Managing and working in the financial-economic sphere was always of interest to Jennys, so she majored in Business Administration.  Her love for finances carried her through to graduation as one of the most outstanding students in her class.  She is 29 years old, married, with two children, ages 10 and 15.  Both of her children are in school, because for her their academic development is essential.  She is an intelligent and enterprising woman.  She has two jobs: during the week she works as a cashier, and on Saturdays and Sundays she is a teacher in a university in her city.

Jennys is asking for a loan to keep growing as a professional.  She needs to pay for a specialization course in Quality Management.  She is placing her hopes in a loan since she doesn’t have the financial resources needed and it is a personal goal that she wants to complete and not leave hanging.  She is thankful for the support of her husband and parents who encourage her daily to make her dreams come true.  She hopes to move forward and never disappoint them.  Among her future plans are to find financial stability and buy her own house.

loans.use: to pay for a specialization course in Quality Management

loans.name: Dinora Emelina

texts.es: Dinora de 30 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 14,11 y 7 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida gracias a la venta de tamales de gallina, los cuales elabora los fines de semana y distribuye de forma ambulante en los cantones cercanos, además se desempeña como jornalera en una finca. Dinora desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda, ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado por un desastre natural, pero al no contar con los recursos económicos necesarios, solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Dinora, 30, lives in her own home with her husband and their children aged 14, 11, and 7.  She is an enterprising woman who earns a living by selling chicken tamales.  She makes the tamales on the weekend, and then distributes them by selling from place to place in the nearby cantons.  She also works as a laborer in a farm.  

Dinora wants to put a new roof on her house, because the one she has now was damaged in a natural disaster.  However, she lacks the necessary financial resources, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in sheets of corrugated metal, wood, and nails to put a new roof on her home.

loans.use: to buy building materials to put a new roof on her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick, iron, metal sheets, and wood to build a room and to change the roof of her house.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is 21 years old and resides in the Buhera District in Zimbabwe. She is a Camfed Learner Guide, teaching life skills education in local schools to improve the well-being of students by enhancing their learning environment. She is operating a poultry project at her home. With this Kiva loan, Grace wants to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase her production. She hopes to provide for her family and remain financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks and chick feed.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en: Dorcas is a 25-year-old married mother of one. She lives in the Hurungwe District of Zimbabwe and is a source of inspiration to young people in her community because she is determined to succeed. She often volunteers at the local secondary school as a Camfed Learner Guide facilitating study and life skills sessions. Dorcas operates a grocery shop at her local business center where she sells sugar, cooking oil, rice, flour, washing soap, soft drinks and snacks. She hopes to expand her business into a larger store if profits allow. She wishes to improve herself financially and give her family a higher standard of living. Her greatest hope is to see vulnerable children being taken care of. Dorcas will use this Kiva loan to purchase her products in bulk to reduce the costs as well as boost sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase groceries in bulk to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cows for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to pay for labor to take care of her coffee plants.

loans.name: Alexis Antonio

texts.es: Alexis de 28 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a sus padres. Él es un joven trabajador que se gana la vida como mecánico automotriz, lo que le permite apoyar económicamente a sus padres, ya que es un joven muy responsable. Alexis desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda, al no contar con las condiciones económicas necesarias, se ha acercado a FUSAI para solicitar un crédito para comprar: cemento y arena para repellar las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en: Alexis is 28 years old, and lives in his own home with his parents. He is a young worker who makes his living as an automotive mechanic. This permits him to financially support his parents, as he is a very responsible young man. Alexis wants to improve the condition of his home by plastering the walls. Since he does not have the necessary economic conditions, he has approached FUSAI to apply for a loan to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of his home.

loans.use: o buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of his home.

loans.name: G.s. Pueblo Nuevo Group

texts.es:
Noemy, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada, tiene 2 hijos, vive en el municipio de Nueva Frontera,  Santa Bárbara. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura con su familia cultivando maíz, frijol y cría de aves. Hace 7 años se dedica al cultivo de café el cual vende en húmedo, pergamino y seco en la misma zona. El  préstamo que solicita es grupal, personalmente solicita 20,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes, foliar y fungicidas para aplicar al cultivo de café y poder mejorar las condiciones del cultivo y cosecha. Su plan es seguir creciendo con este cultivo para mejorar el nivel de vida con su familia. 
El grupo se llama G.S Pueblo Nuevo, integrado por 6 personas, que se dedican a la agricultura y viven en la misma zona. Solicitan un monto de 110,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes, foliar, fungicidas para aplicar a la finca de café. En la foto están: a la izquierda Orlando, Ernesto, Adelmo, Dilcia, Glenda y Noemy a la derecha.
texts.en:
Noemy is 29 years old, married, and has 2 children.  She lives in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, in the department of Santa Barbara.  She always worked in agriculture alongside her family, cultivating corn and beans and raising barnyard fowl.  For 7 years, she's been cultivating coffee. She sells the coffee beans wet, in parchment, and dry in the same area.  She is requesting funds through a group loan, from which she will take 20,000 Honduran lempiras to buy fertilizers, leaf foliates, and fungicides to apply to her coffee crops.  This way she can improve the conditions of her crops and get a better harvest.  Her plan is to continue to grow with this crop so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

Noemy is a member of the communal bank "G.S. Pueblo Nuevo," which has 6 members who work in agriculture and live in the same area.  They are requesting a loan of 110,000 Honduran lempiras to buy fertilizers, leaf foliates, and fungicides to apply to their coffee farms.  In the photo, from the left, you see Orlando, Ernesto, Adelmo, Dilcia, Glenda, and Noemy on the far right.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es:
Elvira es una mujer luchadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene 33 años y es madre soltera de un hijo por el que siempre lucha para poder brindarle una educación de calidad.
Ha estudiado la carrera de Educación, pero luego se dio cuenta que lo suyo eran las ventas, es por eso que empezó desde abajo como vendedora de productos de belleza y ahora, gracias a toda la experiencia que ha adquirido a lo largo de los años está ocupando un mejor puesto en este negocio, ella cree que le va bien porque siempre asume todo con entusiasmo y mucha responsabilidad.
Elvira está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar más productos de belleza para tener en stock y así ofrecer a sus clientes diversidad de productos, con esto sus ventas mejorarán y en poco tiempo podrá adquirir su propia casa para comodidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Elvira is a courageous woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She is 33 years old and is a single mother of one son.  She always struggles on to be able to give him a quality education.  She majored in Education, but then she realized that her gift was in sales.  It is because of this that she began from the bottom as a beauty products salesperson.  Now, thanks to all the experience that she has gained over the years, she is in a much better place with her business.  She thinks that things are going well for her because she always accepts responsibility with enthusiasm.

Elvira is thankful to Kiva lenders because with the support that they have given her she will be able to buy more beauty products in order to have some stock.  In this way, she can offer her customers a greater variety of products.  With this, her sales will improve and in a little while she will be able to get her own house for the comfort of her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics in order to stock her business selling beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies in order to care for her corn and coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rosaly Emperatriz

texts.es: Rosaly tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su pequeña hija de 5 años de edad. Rosaly es una mujer muy carismática y trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia lo necesario. Ella trabaja en una institución cercana a su localidad lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Rosaly desea construir un servicio sanitario con baño para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, etc. Espera poder contar con dicho financiamiento y así seguir  invirtiendo en las mejoras de su vivienda progresivamente.
texts.en: Rosaly is 33 years old and lives at home with her husband and young daughter who is 5 years old. Rosaly is a very charismatic and hardworking woman who does everything in her reach to give her family what they need. She works at an institution close to her village, which allows her to bring money home. Rosaly wants to build a restroom with a bath and is turning this FUSAI credit to invest in the purchase of brick, cement, sand, iron, etc. She hopes to continue to have access to such funding and thus keep investing in home improvements gradually.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand, iron, etc. to build a restroom with a bath.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick, metal sheets, and wood in order to repair a hut as well as the bathroom and the laundry room of her house.

loans.name: Sharai

texts.en:
Sharai resides in Chiredzi District, Zimbabwe, where she volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide, improving the learning environment of the local students. In addition, Sharai rents a table at a nearby flea market. She sells products such as salt, sugar, soap, and cooking oil. Sharai has been running this business for a year and it has enabled her to support her family.  

With this Kiva loan, Sharai will purchase salt, sugar, soap, and cooking oil to increase her supplies. Her hope is to grow the business and open her own store. This will bring stability to her business and will enable her to provide for her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to increase her stock.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith is a 21-year-old entrepreneur from Hurungwe District, Zimbabwe.  She is a young businesswoman who has a poultry production business. She produces broiler chickens in batches of 100 birds every six weeks. She also volunteers with Camfed as a Learner Guide who is focused on teaching students life skills. She plans to increase the number of broiler birds that she produces to 100 birds every three weeks with the support from a Kiva loan. This would allow her to enjoy higher sales and an increase in profits. With the additional profits, she would like to meet the financial needs of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more chicks

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en: Geraldine is a 21-year-old single woman from Hurungwe District, Zimbabwe. She is very passionate about her community and she always volunteers to help the elderly to clean and do chores. She is also a volunteer Camfed Leaner Guide at the local secondary school, teaching students life skills. She has been running a poultry business successfully for over 19 months at her home. She started this as it was cheaper to set up and now she is producing batches of 50 birds every month and selling them to the local community. With the requested Kiva loan, Geraldine intends to make bulk purchases of feed, chicks and vaccines. With the additional profits, she hopes to expand her project into also keeping egg layers. She also buys food for her family with the profits.

loans.use: to purchase more feed, chicks and vaccines.

loans.name: Rene Alejandro

texts.es: Don René tiene 54 años de edad, esta casado, tiene un hijo, vive en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. Don René trabajaba anteriormente en una empresa privada. Ahora tiene su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace mas de 3 años estableció una pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios como ser granos básicos, harina, churros, agua en bolsa,refrescos y otras golosinas. El préstamo que ha solicitado es el tercer ciclo y es por 8,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar mas producto como carnes, harina, azúcar, churros, refrescos y granos básicos para vender y aumentar el inventario. Su meta es seguir trabajando para poder ampliar el negocio y surtirlo mejor para obtener mejores ingresos que le ayuden a darle el estudio a su hijo.
texts.en:
Don René is 54 years old, and he is married with one child. He lives in the municipality of Puerto Cortes.

Previously, Don René worked in a private company. Now he has his own source of income. Three years ago, he opened a grocery store in which he sells food products such as basic grains, flour, churros, bottled water, soft drinks, and other snacks.  

He is in his third loan cycle, and he is requesting a loan of 8,000 Lempiras.  With it, he will purchase more products such as meat, flour, sugar, churros, soft drinks, and basic grains, in order to sell them and increase his inventory.

His goal is to expand the business and stock it more, in order to earn better income that will help him to provide his son with an education.

loans.use: to purchase meat, flour, sugar, churros, soft drinks, and basic grains to sell.

loans.name: Precious

texts.en:
Precious is a 26-year-old young woman. She is single and currently living in the Chiredzi District of Zimbabwe. She is a Camfed Learner Guide, volunteering at a local secondary school in her community. Over the last year, she has grown her poultry business to its current capacity – producing about 50 broiler birds every six weeks and selling them to the local residents. She started the business in 2013 because she wanted to be financially independent.

Precious started her business because she saw that it was very profitable in her community. She would very much like to increase her sales volume and become a supplier to major supermarkets. She will use the Kiva loan to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. Precious hopes to provide for herself and remain financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks and chick feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chicks and chick feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock and increase her sales

loans.name: Familiar

texts.en:
Familia is a 24-year-old businesswoman. She is married and has one child, and she currently lives in the Chiredzi District of Zimbabwe. Familia is a Camfed Learner Guide volunteer at the nearby school, and she teaches young students necessary leadership skills. Over the past year, she has grown her poultry business to its current capacity – producing about 50 broiler birds every six weeks and selling them to the local residents. She started the business in 2013 because she wanted to be financially independent.

Familia started her business because she imagined that it would be very profitable in her community. She intends to increase her sales volume and become a supplier to major supermarkets. She will use the Kiva loan to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. Familia hopes to provide for herself and remain financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks and chick feed.

loans.name: Nyarai

texts.en:
Nyarai is a married mother of one from the Hurungwe district of Zimbabwe. She teaches life skills to students in her community and at the local secondary school. Nyarai has been running her business selling kapenta (sardines) fish successfully in the community for over 18 months. 

With the requested loan, she intends to make bulk purchases of fish directly from the drying racks and fisheries to get bulk discounts. She also wants to buy packaging materials such as plastics and a sealing machine so that she will be able to pack nicely and supply the local retail shops. Her greatest hope is to build a fish supply center in her district and be able to take care of her child.

loans.use: to purchase more kapenta (sardines) to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco de 60 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa. Él es un hombre que todos los días sale a ganarse la vida como jornalero en una finca cercana, además su hijo mayor de edad apoya con la economía familiar. Francisco desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda, ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lamina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 60, lives with his wife in his own home.  He goes out every day to earn a living by working as a day laborer on a nearby farm.  His oldest son also contributes to the family’s finances. 

Francisco wants to replace the roof of his home, as it is deteriorated. He is requesting a loan from FUSAI, in order to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails, in order to replace the roof of his home.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails, in order to replace the roof of his home.

loans.name: Violet

texts.en:
Violet believes that every child deserves a great education. Last year, Violet decided to found "Common Hour", an organization helping to connect students with qualified educators that will ensure their academic success. “I started Common Hour because I believe every student should have the opportunity, regardless of socioeconomic status, to have access to the best and brightest tutors.”

Violet holds a Master’s degree in science, has over ten years of experience in education, and teaches part-time at university. In order to get Common Hour off the ground, Violet needs a loan to invest in a website that will help her reach her clientele in addition to implementing a marketing strategy and covering other operating expenses. 

A native of the Bronx, Violet knows that hard work pays off and that schooling is the best resource a young person has.  “Success for me would be giving the best opportunities and tools for people to achieve academic success.”  

Help Violet’s vision for Common Hour come true!

loans.use: to pay for a website platform to connect students with qualified educators

loans.name: Erinson Leonel

texts.es:
Erinson es un joven soltero muy emprendedor, de 25 años y vive en Chincha junto a su familia. Gracias a mucho esfuerzo y apoyo de sus padres pudo estudiar la carrera de Administración de Negocios y actualmente ejerce su profesión como Asesor de negocios en una gran empresa. El buen desempeño que tiene en el día a día es el resultado de todos los valores que inculcaron en él sus padres y a que siempre trabaja con una ética intachable.
Erinson está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá realizar los trámites para obtener su Bachiller, con esto sus oportunidades laborales mejorarán y seguirá luchando para sacar adelante a su familia y crecer profesionalmente.
texts.en: Erinson is a young, enterprising single man who is 25 years old. He lives in Chincha alongside his family. Thanks to great effort and help from his parents, he was able to study Business Administration, and now puts his studies to use as a Business Advisor at a large company. The great work that he has day to day is the result of all the values his parents instilled in him, and his flawless work ethic. Erinson is thankful to the Kiva lenders because, with the help that they have provided, he has been able to pay for the steps to obtain his Bachelor's Degree; with this, his work opportunities will improve, and he will continue working hard to help his family get ahead and to grow professionally.

loans.use: to pay for the steps to obtain his Bachelor's Degree in Administration.

loans.name: Carmela Cruz

texts.es: Carmela tiene 43 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo  y sus tres hijas de 20 años, 17 años y 15 años de edad. Carmela trabaja en una institución cercana a su localidad como ordenanza. De esta forma junto a su esposo mantiene la economía del hogar. Carmela solicita este crédito a FUSAI ya que desea construir un pequeño corredor a su vivienda y además, desea reparar las paredes de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena lámina galvanizada madera y pines.
texts.en: Carmela is 43 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and her three daughters, ages 20, 17, and 15. Carmela works at an institution close to her area as an orderly. In this way, along with her husband, she supports the household. Carmela asks for a loan from FUSAI now that she wishes to build a small hallway in her home; she also wants to repair the walls of her home. With the loan amount, she will buy cement, sand, galvanized metal, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, galvanized metal, wood, and nails to build a small hallway in her home, and to repair her home's walls.

loans.name: Wayna Taucaray Iii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WAYNA TAUCARAY III”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Claudia ella es casada y tiene 50 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de  frutas, la socia vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas,platanos y mandarinas , la socia tiene un puesto de mercado donde vende las frutas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas . La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos, uvas.
Las socias que estan pegadas a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.




La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are the members of the "Wayna Taucaray III” Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The member is Señora Claudia. She is 50 years old, and she is married with 3 children. She works in her fruit sales business, selling apples, oranges, grapes, plantains, and mandarins.  She has a stall in the market where she sells the fruit. She works from 8:00 A.M. until 5:00 P.M.  She has had this business for 7 years now, and it is going very well for her.  Her dream is to have a shop where she could sell the fruit.

The member is requesting the loan in order to purchase oranges, plantains, and grapes. 

The photo that is attached to the group photo is of two members who asked permission to take their photo after the meeting, due to work reasons. The other members devote themselves to businesses such as selling woven goods, selling clothing, a grocery store, and food sales.

The member thanks those who are part of this dream in this way, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase oranges, plantains, and grapes.

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es: Verónica con 29 años de edad, es soltera y habita junto a su madre en casa familiar. Ella es una joven muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento y apoyar en la economía del hogar. Verónica desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, dando prioridad al techo dado que con el tiempo y las lluvias se ha deteriorado. Por los anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvaniza, madera, pines y teja para reparar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Verónica is 29 years old, single, and lives with her mother in their family home. She is a very hard-working young woman who does everything in her power to put food on the table and help with household expenses.

Verónica wants to improve the condition of her house, focusing on the roof. With the rains and the passage of time, it has deteriorated. To make these repairs, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to use in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal, wood, fasteners, and tile to repair her house's roof.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, fasteners, and tile to repair her house's roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to convert his car to natural gas.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando tiene 66 años de edad, reside en distrito de Buenos Aires, cuenta con casa propia, vive junto a su conyugue e hijos. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además de el comercio; dicho distrito esta ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Fernando es a transladar el plátano desde la planta a la camioneta donde se transportará hasta el almacen, además él cría y vende aves de corral (patos, pollos, pavos, entre otros), Fernando tiene más de 4 años de experiencia en el negocio, y cuenta con muy buenas referencias en la zona donde vive. El destino del crédito será para la compra de calaminas para su domicilio y compra de aves de corral, las calaminas para dar una mayor seguirdad a su domicilio y a su familia y las aves para aumentar y diversificar su stock de animales y asi poder incrementar sus ventas, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fernando is 66 years old and lives in the district of Buenos Aires. He has his own house, where he lives with his wife and children.

Life in the community is calm, and many work as farmers or livestock breeders, in addition to commerce. His district is located in the province of Morropón, in the Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Fernando transports bananas for a living, from the plant to the truck that transports them to the warehouse. He also raises and sells poultry (ducks, chickens, and turkeys among others). Fernando has more than 4 years of experience in this business, and he has very good references in the area where he lives.

This loan will be used to buy corrugated sheet metal for his house, and to purchase poultry. The sheet metal is to make his house and family more secure, and the birds will augment and diversify his stock of animals. Then he can increase his sales, improve his earnings, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corrugated sheet metal for his house and to buy poultry to raise

loans.name: Witthong Feliberto

texts.es:
Witthong radica en Santo Domingo de los Colorados, zona cálida húmeda y conocida en el país por la etnia Tsachila que habita en el sector.  Con 37 años, él vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos varones, cuentan con casa propia la misma que la ha podido construir gracias al esfuerzo de su trabajo durante todos estos años.
Witthong desde muy pequeño aprendió de su padre el arte de la construcción de viviendas, es por ello que hace 14 años él se ha dedicado de lleno a este servicio, lo contratan porque realiza buen trabajo; construye escaleras, cisternas, construye viviendas. Le ha ido muy bien ya que gracias a este trabajo él ha podido llevar el sustento a su hogar y darles la educación a sus hijos.
Acudió a Fundación Alternativa a informase como se lo podría ayudar y se fue fascinado por los productos y el servicio que la organización brinda. Obtuvo un crédito y con ello el podrá comprar el material necesario para su trabajo, como compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena. Se siente muy agradecido con la institución y con el proyecto Kiva por ayudarle con el crédito para la compra de material para su trabajo.
texts.en:
Witthong makes his home in Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a warm, humid zone known in the country for the ethnic Tsachila who live in that sector. At the age of 37, he lives with his wife and three sons. They have their own house, which he has been able to construct thanks to the effort of his work through all these years.

When he was very young, Witthong learned the art of constructing houses from his father. It is for that reason that for 14 years he has dedicated himself to providing this service. People hire him because he does good work. He builds staircases, cisterns, and houses. It has gone very well for him, since thanks to this work he has been able to bring sustenance to his household and educate his sons.

He turned to Fundación Alternativa to find out how it would be able to help him, and he was fascinated by the products and service that the organization offers. He obtained a loan and with it he will be able to buy the material needed for his work, such as bricks, cement, and sand. He feels very grateful to the institution and the Kiva project for helping him with the loan to purchase the material for his work.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and bricks.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en: Sharon is a 21-year-old businesswoman. She is single and lives in the Hurungwe district of Zimbabwe. She has been operating a poultry business for over a year and a half now, selling chickens to people in the community. Over the past year she has grown her business to a capacity of 80 birds per every six weeks. When she is not attending to her business, Sharon serves as a Cama member doing volunteer work in her community. She is a Learner Guide at the local secondary school where she teaches students life skills. With the requested loan, Sharon intends to make bulk purchases of chicks, feed, sawdust, vaccines, broiler concentrate and maize to reduce costs and boost her sales and profits. With the additional profits she wishes to expand her business to be able to supply the local supermarkets.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks, feed, sawdust, maize, broiler concentrate and vaccines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags, shoes, jeans, shirts, skirts, track suits, and T-shirts to increase her supplies

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en: Sharon is a 22-year-old single woman from the Hurungwe district of Zimbabwe. She owns a small stall at the local market where she sells kapenta (also known as matemba or dried sardines). She currently sells them to her neighbors. Sharon inspires young women in her community by acting as a Camfed Learner Guide who teaches students  how to maintain their well-being, and by advising aspiring entrepreneurs. She started her business in 2013 when she saw an opportunity to better provide for herself. She will use the loan from Kiva to purchase many bags of matemba (sardines) from the fisheries to get bulk discounts and therefore increase profits. An increase in income will enable her to support herself and improve her family’s well-being. She also hopes to help the underprivileged children in her community.

loans.use: To purchase more kapenta to sell

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
Jugar a la escuelita con sus amigos del vecindario era uno de los juegos favoritos de María de los Ángeles cuando era una niña, siempre le gustaba ser la profesora del grupo. Su interés por impartir clases y brindar conocimientos fue creciendo, lo que la llevo a estudiar Ciencia en Pedagogía, luego se especializó en una materia y es Licenciada en Inglés. A sus 46 años es profesora de inglés en una escuela secundaria, está casada y tiene un hijo de 17 años que estudia Ingeniería. 
María solicita el préstamo para pagar la titulación de un Posgrado de Didáctica General que está realizando los días domingo. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que desea seguir superándose profesionalmente, al mismo tiempo no quiere perder la oportunidad de aprender nuevos métodos de estudio que refuerce sus habilidades y destrezas al momento de dar las clases, puesto que lo primordial para ella es que sus alumnos capten la lección y  adquieran conocimientos. Es una señora amable y emprendedora, agradece el apoyo de su familia, quien la motiva a cumplir sus ideales, entre sus metas está seguir contribuyendo en la educación de Nicaragua.
texts.en:
Playing school with her neighborhood friends was one of the favorite games for Maria de los Ángeles as a child; she always liked to play the role of the teacher in the group. Her interest in teaching classes and sharing knowledge was growing, and it eventually led her to study the science of pedagogy, then later she specialized in an area and now holds a degree in English. 

At 46 years of age, she is an English teacher at a high school, is married, and has a 17 year-old son who is studying engineering.

Maria is requesting a loan to pay for a graduate degree in general teaching which she is completing on Sundays. She relies on the financing because she wants to continue excelling professionally. She does not want to lose a chance to learn new methods of study that reinforce her skills when imparting classes. 

Her ultimate interest is for her students to grasp the lesson and acquire knowledge. She is a friendly and enterprising woman and is grateful for the support of her family, who motivates her to fulfill her ideals, among her goals is to continue contributing to the education of Nicaragua.

loans.use: pay for a graduate degree in general teaching.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 26-year-old businesswoman. She is married and has no children. Currently she lives in the Mwenezi district in Zimbabwe. She lives with her husband, her mother-in-law, and other extended family. Caroline has been working as a Camfed Learner Guide, teaching life skills education in local schools to improve the well-being of students by enhancing their learning environment. In addition, Caroline rents a table at the local flea market where she sells products such as bags, shoes, jeans, shirts, skirts, track suits, and T-shirts. She has been running this business for one year now, which has enabled her to support her family.  

With the Kiva loan, Caroline will purchase more products to increase her supplies. Her hope is to grow the business and open her own store. This will bring stability to her business and will enable her to provide for her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing and to increase her sales

loans.name: Faith

texts.en: Faith is married and lives in the Hurungwe district of Zimbabwe. She is a volunteer Camfed Learner Guide and mentors young students. For work, Faith runs a small poultry business supplying broiler chickens to her community. She has a current capacity of 50 birds every six weeks. Faith is seeking a Kiva loan so that she can purchase more chicks, stock feed, chemicals, and feeding troughs to meet the high demand in her area. The growth of her business will improve her quality of life and create employment opportunities for members of her community.

loans.use: To purchase more chicks, feed, and vaccines.

loans.name: Mario Alexander

texts.es: Mario tiene 29 años de edad y trabaja desde hace mucho tiempo en una institución cercana a su localidad. Él es un hombre muy trabjador quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para mantener la economía de su familia. Mario desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda y las puertas de la misma dado que con el tiempo se han deteriorado y es necesario cambiarlas lo antes posible. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tejas, madera, vara de castilla y puertas. Espera contar con este financiamiento para dar inicio a las reparaciones lo antes posible.
texts.en: Mario is 29 years old and has worked at a local business for a long time. He is a very hardworking man who makes everything he has with his own hands to manage the household finances. Mario would like to replace the roof and the doors of his house as they have deteriorated with the weather and it is necessary to replace them when possible. For the previous reasons, he asks this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of tiles, wood, rods, and doors. He hopes to rely on this loan to begin repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy tiles, wood, rods, and doors to repair the roof and change the doors of the household.

loans.name: Maritza Oristila

texts.es:
La señora  Maritza Oristila   de 26  años de edad es casada,  tiene dos hijos   que dependen de ella,  sus  hijos tienen  08 y 06 años vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Doña  Maritza Oristila   tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 05  años  a la actividad de  venta de tamales, pan y queso, su venta es ambulante y sus clientes son los amigos y personas que visita para ofrecerles sus productos. 
Doña  Maritza Oristila   es una mujer trabajadora y desea sacar adelante a su familia, está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de hojas de plátano, maíz, harina, leña, pollo, condimentos, aceite, etc. que son la materia prima para elaborar sus productos, es su sexto préstamo que solicita. 
Su sueño es mejorar su casa  y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Septiembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Señora Maritza Oristila, 26-years-old, is married, with two dependent children ages 8 and 6. She lives in the community of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. Doña Maritza Oristila has her own house and for five years she has sold tamales, bread and cheese. She is a street vendor and her customers are friends and people she visits to offer her products. Doña Maritza Oristila is a hardworking woman and wants to raise her family well, and is asking the loan to buy banana leaves, corn, flour, firewood, chicken, condiments, oil, etc. that are the primary ingredients to make her products; this is her sixth requested loan. Her dream is to improve her house and her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - September, 2014

loans.use: to buy banana leaves, corn, flour, firewood, chicken, condiments, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, foliar sprays, and fertilizers among other things to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase stock and get more profit for her business selling clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her business selling clothing and to create employment in her community

loans.name: Gabriel Gustavo

texts.es:
Gabriel es un señor de 52 años, vive junto a sus esposa y sus cuatro hijos en un recinto de Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, un sector muy productivo, con un clima cálido húmedo y donde se siente mucha tranquilidad ya que esta apartado de la ciudad.
Gabriel es un señor muy sencillo y humilde, un hombre trabajador, desde hace más de 20 años él se ha dedicado a su finca donde produce palma, cacao, palmito, además cría pollos y chanchos. Su esposa también cumple un rol muy importante ya que ella ha sido su apoyo en todos estos años, ella también trabaja en los jornales para mantener a su finca. Así han sacado adelante a sus hijos, les han dado el estudio que ellos no pudieron obtener.
Gabriel es un cliente fiel a la institución, ha trabajado con la Fundación por el buen trato al cliente y su buen personal que cuenta, agradece enormemente a KIVA porque con estos pequeños créditos él ha podido mantener sus producciones, ahora con este crédito él va a comprar plantas de cacao para sembrar.
Se siente muy feliz por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Gabriel is a 52-year-old man who lives with his wife and their four children in a precinct of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, a very productive sector with a warm, humid climate, where it feels very tranquil because it is removed from the city.
Gabriel is an honest and humble, hardworking man, who for more than 20 years has worked his farm where he grows palms, cocoa, and palmetto, and also grows chickens and pigs. His wife also carries a very important role as she has been his support for all these years, and she also handles the finances to maintain their farm. In this way they have raised their children, and have given them the education they were not able to obtain.
Gabriel is a faithful customer of the institution, and has worked with the Fundación because of the good customer treatment and its good staff. He is enormously grateful to KIVA because with these small loans he has been able to maintain his production; now with this loan he will buy cocoa plants to sow.
He feels very appreciative of the provided support.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa plants.

loans.name: Tatenda

texts.en:
Tatenda is a 22-year-old married mother of one. She lives in the Hurungwe District of Zimbabwe and is a source of inspiration to young people in her community because she is determined to succeed. She often volunteers at the local secondary school as a Camfed Learner Guide facilitating study and life skills sessions. 

Tatenda operates a grocery shop at her local business center where she sells sugar, cooking oil, rice, flour, washing soap, soft drinks and snacks. She hopes to expand her business into a larger store if profits allow. 

She wishes to improve herself financially and give her family a higher standard of living. Her greatest hope is to see vulnerable children being taken care of.

loans.use: To purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice is a 30-year-old married mother of one. She currently resides in the Hurungwe District of Zimbabwe where she operates a small clothing shop at the local business center. She started her business with the savings she made as a part-time farm laborer. She sells cosmetics, accessories, jackets, shirts, bags, and shoes. 

Loice inspires young women in her community as both a Camfed Learner Guide who teaches students about their well-being and as an entrepreneur. She intends to use the loan to increase her stock and improve sales by purchasing her products in bulk. An increase in income will enable her to support herself and improve her family’s well-being.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 21 años de edad, soltera, madre de una hija y su negocio es la venta de baldes plásticos y metálicos.
Ella es emprendedora, fuerte, luchadora, buena madre, dedicada, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la ciudad de El Alto que se ubica sobre los 4000 metros sobre el nivel del mar, es la parta más alta del área metropolitana de La Paz, Su clima es frío de alta montaña y seco.
Maria es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, viste a la moda, su lengua materna es el aymara y lo combina con español según sus necesidades de comercio. Su negocio es la venta de baldes plásticos y turriles metálicos a ferreterías, ella se encarga de buscar compradores y les entrega sus productos de acuerdo a sus necesidades. Su trabajo es bastante difícil porque lo realiza junto a su hija de apenas un año de edad, su madre le ayuda buscando clientes y realizando algunas preventas. Ella sueña tener un auto donde poder transportar sus baldes y turriles para abastecer a todas las ferreterías de la ciudad, dándole una mejor calidad de vida a su pequeña hija.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de baldes plásticos y turriles metálicos por mayor y con los beneficios mejorar la calidad de vida de su pequeña hija.
texts.en:
Maria is a 21-year-old woman, single, mother of one daughter, and her business is the sale of plastic and metal buckets.
She is entrepreneurial, strong, a fighter, a good mother, dedicated, responsible, and very hardworking. She conducts her business in the city of El Alto which is located over 4000 meters above sea level; it is the highest part of the metropolitan area of La Paz. Its climate is a cold, dry, high mountain climate.
Maria is of swarthy complexion, medium build, with long black hair, and fashionable. Her mother tongue is Aymara and she combines it with Spanish according to her business needs. Her business is to sell plastic buckets and metal barrels to hardware stores; she is responsible for finding buyers and she delivers her products according to their needs. Her work is quite difficult because she does it while with her daughter who is just one year old. Her mother helps her by seeking clients and completing some presales. She hopes to have a car in which she can transport her barrels and buckets to supply all the hardware stores in the city, giving a better quality of life for her small daughter.
It is for these reasons Maria requests a loan to buy plastic buckets and metal barrels wholesale, and with the proceeds improve the quality of life of her small daughter.

loans.use: to buy plastic buckets and metal barrels wholesale, and with the proceeds to improve the quality of life of her small daughter.

loans.name: Yangyai Group

texts.en: Mr. Nouphad's village takes water from wells and from the local streams.  Some people in the village are able to buy bottles water.  The water in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water.    Mr. Nouphad is excited that he and his neighbors were able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income and available working days due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal or foraging for wood and/or purchasing bottled water. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nongsaman Group

texts.en: Mrs. Tong's village takes water from wells and from the local streams.  Some people in the village are able to buy bottles water.  The water in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water.    Mrs. Tong is excited that she and her neighbors were able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income and available working days due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal or foraging for wood and/or purchasing bottled water. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nueva Vision Group

texts.es:
Maria Isabel, tiene 41 años de edad, ella es socia del grupo "Nueva Visión" éste grupo está formado por cinco integrantes.
María Isabel, tiene aproximadamente cinco años atendiendo su librería,paralelamente se da un tiempo para dar clases de nivelación para niños de educación primaria. María Isabel una señora muy activa, siempre está pensando que hacer, como ayudar en su casa, En su negocio le ha ido muy bien, poco a poco ha salido adelante, logrando tener un negocio próspero y que puede afrontar las campañas escolares, abasteciéndose con una mercadería muy surtida de útiles escolares.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de algunos artículos de regalo, ya que las librerías deben tener de todo lo que bazar. Está muy agradecida con los inversionistas ya que gracias a ellos tiene la oportunidad de contar con un negocio propio.
texts.en:
María Isabel is 41 years old and a member of the "Nueva Visión loan group, which has five members.

María has had her stationery shop for around five years. She also takes time to give primary school children private tuition. María is a very active woman and is always thinking about what she can do to help out at home. Her business has gone very well and, little by little, she has made it prosperous. María is able to handle the start of the new term, stocking up with a lot of useful items for school.

This loan will be invested in gifts, items which all good stationery shops must sell. María is very grateful to Kiva investors as, thanks to them, she will be able to count on her own business.

loans.use: to invest in gifts to stock up her stationery.

loans.name: Sin Fronteras Group

texts.es:
Isabel, tiene 57 años de edad, ella forma parte del grupo "Sin Fronteras" que está conformado por cinco socias, todas ellas comerciantes con la meta de lograr una independencia económica y laboral.
Desde hace mas de doce años Isabel se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en un local alquilado ubicado en un mercado. 
Isabel es una mujer trabajadora, que poco a poco a sacado adelante su negocio y aumentando su mercadería, con mucho esfuerzo junta su capital para que su negocio crezca y a lo mejor juntar para poder adquirir un puesto propio y dejar de pagar los alquileres.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de productos de abarrotes, como leche, aceite, arroz que es lo que mas vende.
texts.en:
Isabel is 57 years old and is part of the "Sin Fronteras" group, which has five members. All of the members are businesswomen who share the goal of having work and financial autonomy. 

For more than 12 years, Isabel has made a living selling groceries on premises that she rents at a market.

Isabel is hard-working and, little by little, she has expanded her business and increased her merchandise. With a lot of effort and with capital, Isabel wants to expand the business and, perhaps, save up in order to buy her own stall and not have to pay rent.

This loan will be invested in groceries, such as milk, oil and rice, her most popular products.

loans.use: to invest in groceries.

loans.name: Kenia Jahaira

texts.es: Kenia tiene 36 años de edad y habita junto a su esposo en casa propia. Ella trabaja en una institución cercana a su localidad lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y apoyar en la economía del hogar. La vivienda de Kenia carece de algunos servicios basicos como el servicio sanitario y el baño por lo que desea construirlos lo antes posible para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como lámina, madera, cemento, arena, ladrillo, etc.
texts.en:
Kenia is 36 years old and lives with her husband in their own house. She works at an institution close to her home, which makes it possible for her to bring money home and help with the household expenses.

Kenia's home lacks some basic services like a toilet or a bathroom, and she wants to build this as soon as possible. Therefore, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI in order to invest it in the purchase of the necessary materials like galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement, sand, bricks, etc.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement, sand, bricks, etc. to build a bathroom with shower.

loans.name: Ana Alexandra

texts.es:
Ana es una señora de 24 años, vive en unión libre pero su esposo pasa más tiempo fuera de la ciudad ya que trabaja muy lejos, la visita una vez al mes y aprovecha al máximo para compartir con su pequeño hijo de dos meses, habitan en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, ciudad conocida en el Ecuador porque habita la etnia Tsachila, cuenta con un clima agradable y es una zona muy productiva
Ana siempre ha velado por el bienestar de su hogar, por ello ha trabajado duro durante 7 años como cocinera en un hotel conocido de la ciudad, cuenta con un pequeño ahorro que ha ido guardando durante este tiempo pero necesita más capital ya que va a emprender en un negocio, que hace años atrás tuvo; quiere irse deslindando de su trabajo y comenzar a vender artículos del hogar recorriendo en recintos y lugares aledaños para así pasar más tiempo con su pequeño. Ana  acudió a Fundación Alternativa y pudo obtener el crédito de emprendimiento porque es la única institución a nivel local que apoya a un emprendedor, se siente muy feliz porque la institución pudo hacer realidad su sueño, con este crédito podrá comprar sillas, mesas, cajoneras, ropa, edredones necesarios para comenzar en su negocio, agradece enormemente ya que podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y pasar más tiempo con su pequeño.
texts.en:
Ana is 24 years old and has a partner. He spends a lot of the time away from home, however, as he works very far away. He comes to visit Ana once a month and takes advantage of this time in order to spend it with their young two-month-old son. Ana lives in the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados, known in Ecuador as being the home of the Tsachila people. The city has a pleasant climate and is a very productive city in industrial terms.

Ana has always looked out for the well-being of her household and so for seven years she has worked as a cook in a well-known hotel in the city. She has a small amount of savings that she has built up over time but she now needs more capital as she is going to re-start a business that she had some years ago. Ana wants to start reducing her hours at her job and to begin selling household items as a street vendor in the local areas. This will allow her to spend more time with her young son. Ana came to "Fundación Alternativa" and was able to take out a loan here as it is the only local organisation that supports entrepreneurs. Ana is very happy as the organisation can make Ana's dreams come true. She will use this loan to buy chairs, tables, clothes, duvets and chests of drawers, which she needs to start her business. Ana is extremely grateful as, with this loan, she will be able to improve her quality of life and spend more time with her son.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, clothes, duvets and chests of drawers.

loans.name: Heang's Group

texts.en:
A villager in the Battambang province of the Thmor Koul district, Heang, is aged 56 years and married with five children, one of whom is dependant on her.  Fishing is the main source of income.  After this business, she is works in a paid job. She has been working in this business for twenty years and earns 40,000 KHR per day. 

This is her second loan with VisionFund, and the first loan has helped her family to have sufficient food. She is now leading her group to suggest a loan 400,000 KHR each. She, as a group leader, will use her loan portion to renovate a house. She hopes her family will have a better living.

loans.use: To renovate a house.

loans.name: Ena Dinora

texts.es: Ena tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres y sus tres hijos de 15 años, 9 años y 13 años de edad. Ena se dedica a la venta de verduras, gelatinas y productos helados desde hace tres años lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ena desea construir un nuevo servicio sanitario con taza lavable dado que el que tiene es de fosa y colapso. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, taza lavable, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción del servicio sanitario lo antes posible.
texts.en: Ena is 29 years old and a single mother. She lives with her parents and three children, ages 15, 13 and 9 years old, in house owned by the family. Ena has made a living selling vegetables, jelly and frozen products for three years. Ena wants to build a new flush lavatory in her home as the current one is not a flush toilet. To carry out this work, Ena is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the necessary building materials, such as cement, sand and a toilet. Ena hopes to be able to count on this loan and to start building her new lavatory as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and a toilet, in order to build a lavatory in her home.

loans.name: Amilcar Alexander

texts.es: Amilcar tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 14 años, 12 años y 8 años de edad.  Amilcar se caracteriza por ser muy responsable y dedicado a su familia. Tiene dos años de trabajar como albañil en una empresa cercana a su localidad lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Amilcar desea construir un cuarto adicional en su vivienda dado que es pequeña y desea dar mayor comodidad a su familia. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, lámina, madera, etc.
texts.en: Amilcar is 36 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his wife and three children, ages fourteen, twelve and eight. Amilcar is very responsible and dedicated to his family. For two years he has been working as a building at a local business. This allows him to support his household. Amilcar wants to build another room on his home as it is very small and he wants to make it more comfortable for his family. This loan will be used to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, metal sheeting and more.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron bars, metal sheeting, wood and more to build a room in his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more uniforms, suits, bags, shoes, radios, and phones.

loans.name: Tendai

texts.en: Tendai is 19 years old and lives in the Hurungwe District of Zimbabwe. She volunteers in the local school as a Camfed Learner Guide teaching students life skills. To support herself she runs a small business at the local market selling shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets. She really loves her business and would like to increase her sales volume and expand. She believes that if she receives her Kiva loan, her business will improve considerably. Tendai is seeking a Kiva loan so that she can purchase more shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets to increase her stock. She intends to use the proceeds to improve her standard of living and hopefully create employment opportunities for people in her community if the business continues to thrive.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Carmen Nohemy

texts.es: Carmen tiene 28 años de edad y reside junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 13 años y 11 meses de edad. Carmen trabaja junto a su esposo en una carpintería la cual les permite percibir los ingresos necesarios para mantener a sus hijos. Carmen es una mujer visionaria quien se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia. Ella ha notado que el techo de su vivienda se encuentra en malas condiciones lo cual la ha llevado ha tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, calvos y polines. Espera poder contar contar con este financiamiento y así poder cambiar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Carmen is 28 years old and lives with her husband and two children, ages 13 years and 11 months. Carmen works with her husband at a carpentry workshop, which allows the couple to earn the necessary income to support their children. Carmen is a visionary who looks after her family's well-being. She has noticed that the roof of her home is in bad condition and has therefore decided to apply for this loan from FUSAI in order to buy metal sheeting, wood, nails and purlins to repair the roof. Carmen hopes to be able to count on this loan and replace the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, wood, nails and purlins to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a large fenced building for her turkeys.

loans.name: Hazvinei

texts.en: Hazvinei is a 19-year-old single mother with two children. She operates a grocery shop and resides in Buhera District, Zimbabwe.  She has also been working as a CAMFED as a learner guide at the local secondary school. With this Kiva loan, Hazvinei intends to purchase more products like soap, sugar, salt, jam, washing and bathing soap in large quantities. She wants to increase her sales and create employment in her community. She intends to assist vulnerable children and also improve her life style.

loans.use: to purchase more products like soap, sugar, salt, jam, washing and bathing soap.

loans.name: Christian Bladimir

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos un Cantón de clima cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora tradicionalmente se realiza las festividades por el aniversario del mismo, este Cantón es un atractivo turístico muy visitado por su variedad de flora y fauna silvestre. 
En este Cantón vive el señor Cristian un joven luchador de 25 años mantiene una sólida relación en unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 1 años 9 meses por la que día con día lucha y se supera para darle un buen futuro. 
Él tiene el negocio en un pequeño Recinto llamado la Florida, al negocio le dedica un promedio de 4 horas por día, en el negocio recibe la ayuda de sus padres cuando él está fuera por un trabajo que tiene como guardia de seguridad.
El Señor Cristian se dedica a la producción de tilapia aprendió de este negocio con la familia en su niñez solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio en la ampliación del negocio, con la inversión de este crédito mejorara su calidad de vida y el de su familia, Cristian agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos is a canton with a humid and warm climate. Friendly and hardworking people live here and they traditionally celebrate festivals on each anniversary. The canton is an attractive tourist destination visited for its variety of plants and wildlife. 

Cristian lives in this canton. He is a hard-working young man of 25 years, is in a stable common-law marriage and has a daughter, who is 1 year and 9 months old. For her, he struggles every day and excels to provide her with a good future.

He has a small business which is called "Florida". He works in this business for approximately 4 hours per day, and his parents help him with this business when he is outside to work in his other job as a security guard.

Cristian's business is a fish farm for tilapia. He learnt this from his family when he was small. He is asking for a loan to invest it into his business in order to grow it. With this loan, he will improve the quality of life of his family.

Christian thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the opportunities they provide.

loans.use: to expand his tilapia fish farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, wood, rods, tiles, etc. in order to repair the roof of her home and to build a bathroom with a basin.

loans.name: Shamira Rosario

texts.es:
Shamira es una joven mujer de 18 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es la venta de comida rápida.
Ella es emprendedora, inteligente, dedicada, luchadora, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio es la venta de comida rápida en la zona 16 de Julio, un sitio caracterizado por el comercio en todas las áreas.
Shamira es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, viste a la moda, su lengua materna es el aymara el cual ya casi no utiliza, y habla español porque estudia y para el comercio. Su negocio es la venta de comida rápida, como ser; pollo frito, hamburguesas, salchipapas, etc. Ella estudia gastronomía en un instituto privado, y trabaja abriendo su snack tres días a la semana porque los demás días los ocupa en el estudio. Los estudios los combina con su trabajo y lo realiza en casa de su abuela porque sus padres viven en un lugar alejado. Su sueño es terminar su carrera y realizar la especialidad de pastelería para desarrollar y diversificar su negocio.
Es por esos motivos que Shamira solicita un préstamo para pagar las cuotas de su carrera por adelantado y terminar su profesión.
texts.en:
Shamira is a young 18-year-old woman. She is single, has no children, and works selling fast food.

She is enterprising, intelligent, dedicated, determined, responsible and very hard-working. She sells fast food in the zone 16 de Julio, which is an area with all kinds of trade. Shamira has dark skin, is of medium height, has long, black hair, and is fashionably dressed. Her mother tongues is Aymara but she hardly uses this language, she speaks Spanish at school and in her job. Her business is selling fast food, like fried chicken, hamburgers, salchipapas (hot dog and fries), etc. 

She studies gastronomy at a private school and she works in her food stall on three days per week, because on the other days she needs to study. She can combine her studies with her work and stays at the house of her grandmother, because her parents live far away.

It is her dream to complete her studies and to start offering pastries in order to develop and diversify her business.

For these reasons, Shamira is asking for a loan to pay in advance for her school fees and to be able to get her degree.

loans.use: to pay in advance for her school fees and to get her degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to look after her coffee crops this new season.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 33 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su grupo familiar.  Él es un hombre emprendedor que con el fin de sacar adelante a sus hijos hace todo lo que este a su alcance.  Manuel se gana la vida mediante la venta  de sandalias para hombre y mujer, actividad que realiza desde hace mucho tiempo y es la que le permite sostener la economía de su hogar. Manuel desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena grava, hierro y bloques de cemento para construir un cuarto en su vivienda. Expresa estar agradecido con el crédito que recibió en el pasado para invertir en su negocio.
texts.en:
Manuel, 33, lives in his own home with his family.  He is an entrepreneur who does all he can to provide for his children.  Manuel earns a living selling men's and women's sandals and has been in business a long time which has allowed him to support the household economy.

Manuel wants to build a room onto his housse and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and cement blocks.  He is grateful for the loan he received in the past which he invested in his business.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and cement blocks to build a room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy galvanized sheets, wood and bolts to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy wood, nails, metal sheeting, etc. to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm supplies to attend to her coffee crop.

loans.name: Regino Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Regino es habitante de chinandega es casado tiene dos hijos menores de edad que se encuentran es edad escolar el señor trabaja brindado el servisio de transporte en un triciclo el inicia un dia de trabajo desde las 5 de la mañana hasta 6 de la tarde de lunes a domingo es un hombre responsable, trabajador , humilde  que trabaja fuertemente para llevar el alimento a su hogar y poder ayudar a sus hijos a salir adelante.


el señor solicita financiamiento para el mantenimiento de su triciclo.
texts.en:
Regino lives in Chinandega, is married and has two school-aged children.  He works in transport services with his three-wheeled from 5:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m., Monday through Sunday.  He is a responsible, dedicated, humble man who works hard to put food on the table and help his children get ahead.

The loan he is requesting is to provide maintenance for his three-wheeled vehicle.

loans.use: to buy tires and paint for the three-wheeled vehicle.

loans.name: Roxana De Jesus

texts.es: Roxana tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas de 9 años y 6 años de edad. Roxana se dedica a la venta de sopa de gallina y de tamales. Tiene 3 años de dedicarse a este negocio y cada vez sus clientes la prefieren más. Roxana desea legalizar su terreno dado que hace unos años pagó por el lote pero no  ha hecho los tramites para sacar la escritura. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en los tramites de escrituración de su terreno y poder así contar con su patrimonio el cual desea dejar a sus hijos en herencia.
texts.en:
Roxana is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and their two daughters who are 9 years and 6 years old.

Roxana works selling chicken soup and tamales. She has had this business for three years and attracts more and more customers. 

Roxana wants to legalize the ownership of he land, because she paid for her plot a couple of years ago but has not done the paperwork to have this put in writing yet.
